cast.overview: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.
cast.title: About Elly

details.biography: Ahmad Mehranfar is a cinema and theatre actor who was born in 1975 in Kashan, Iran. He began his career with the theatre. "Bread, Love and Engine 1000" by Abolhassan Davoodi, is the first movie experience of Ahmad Mehranfar. Among his other films that he played Tahmineh Milani's "ceasefire", Abdolreza Kahani's "Horse is a Decent Animal", "About Elly" by Asghar Farhadi and "Midday Adventures" by Mohammad Hossein Mahdavian can be named.
details.name: Ahmad Mehranfar
